headline: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) Appoints Paul M. Gallagher As New Principal Accounting Officer
summary: Brown & Brown (NYSE:BRO) has recently seen executive changes with the appointment of Paul M. Gallagher as principal accounting officer, bolstering its financial management team. While the broader market rose 3.9% in the last week and has seen a 12% increase over the past year, Brown & Brown's stock price remained relatively flat over the last quarter. The company's strong first-quarter earnings and dividend declaration would have supported share price stability, notwithstanding broader market...
